General InformationImplement DataManager class
License ConditionsSee <License>
QPFLibrary namespace
Functions
initInitialize the component
run(Virtual) method executed when the thread is created
initializeDBInitialize the DB (currently just an INI text file)
saveToDBSave the information of a new (incoming) product to the DB (currently just an INI text file)
saveOutputsToDBSave the information on generated output products to the archive
isProductAvailableReturns TRUE if there is a product type like the requested in the DB
getProductLatestReturns TRUE if there is a product type like the requested in the DB
